Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IBackplane

  • public interface IBackplane
    Provides access to the Backplane controlled settings and to the public Backplane API's. Permits clients to manually sync, change the device nickname and change the download enablement of the device. The Backplane can be retrieved through getBackplane in Virtuoso.
    CategoryTitle:
    005_backplane Backplane Settings Methods

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  IBackplane.IBackplaneDevicesObserver
      Interface for receiving the array of devices registered on the Backplane for the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • getSettings

        IBackplaneSettings getSettings()
        Provides access to the Backplane settings.
        Returns:
        Backplane Settings

      • changeExternalDeviceId

        void changeExternalDeviceId​(String aExternalDeviceId)
                     throws BackplaneException
        Change the registered external device id for this device.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.EXTERNAL_ID_CHANGE. The new external device id will only be applied on the device once it communicates with the Backplane.
        The external device id length is limited to 255 characters.
        Parameters:
        aExternalDeviceId - External device id to be registered for the current device, max 255 characters.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • changeNickname

        void changeNickname​(String aNewNickname)
             throws BackplaneException
        Change the registered nickname for this device.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.NAME_CHANGE. The new nickname will only be applied on the device once it communicates with the Backplane.
        The nickname length is limited to 255 characters.
        Parameters:
        aNewNickname - Nickname to be registered for the current device, max 255 characters.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • changeNickname

        void changeNickname​(String aNewNickname,
                    IBackplaneDevice aDevice)
             throws BackplaneException
        Change the registered nickname for a device.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.NAME_CHANGE. The new nickname will only be applied on the device once it communicates with the Backplane.
        The nickname length is limited to 255 characters.
        Parameters:
        aNewNickname - Nickname to be registered for the device, max 255 characters.
        aDevice - The device to be updated.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        IBackplaneDevice, Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • changeDownloadEnablement

        void changeDownloadEnablement​(boolean aEnable)
                       throws BackplaneException
        Request to update the "download-enabled" flag for the current device. The Backplane will persist the change.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.DOWNLOAD_ENABLEMENT_CHANGE.
        Parameters:
        aEnable - True to request "download-enabled" for this device, false to disable
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • changeDownloadEnablement

        void changeDownloadEnablement​(boolean aEnable,
                              IBackplaneDevice aDevice)
                       throws BackplaneException
        Request to update the "download-enabled" flag for a device. The Backplane will persist the change.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.DOWNLOAD_ENABLEMENT_CHANGE.
        Parameters:
        aEnable - True to request "download-enabled" for the device, false to disable
        aDevice - The device to be updated.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        IBackplaneDevice, Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • unregisterDevice

        void unregisterDevice​(IBackplaneDevice aDevice)
               throws BackplaneException
        Request to deregister a different device that is associated with the current user.
        The method only succeeds if and when the Backplane persists the change. In other words, Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Completion is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.DEVICE_UNREGISTERED.
        Parameters:
        aDevice - The device to unregister.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane or if the device passed in is the current device.
        See Also:
        IBackplaneDevice, Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • getDevices

        void getDevices​(IBackplane.IBackplaneDevicesObserver aObserver)
         throws BackplaneException
        Request the list of devices registered with the backplane for the current user.
        Runs asynchronously, the result of the operation is returned to the observer. Virtuoso must be able to reach the Backplane and already be registered with the Backplane.
        Parameters:
        aObserver - The observer that will receive the array of backplane devices. If communication with the backplane fails an empty array is returned to the observer.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        IBackplaneDevice, IBackplane.IBackplaneDevicesObserver, Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • sync

        @Deprecated
void sync()
   throws BackplaneException
        Deprecated.
        Manually request a sync
        This method has been deprecated. It is not necessary to manually request sync as the service will sync the device at the necessary intervals to ensure it is up to date with the server. Virtuoso's background service will attempt to sync with the Backplane at least once every 24 hours, but will also sync upon a number of internal events. The sync is internally rate limited to ensure it cannot be called too frequently.
        Completion of a sync is reported through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.SYNC.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • unregister

        void unregister()
         throws BackplaneException
        Unregister this device on the Backplane. Virtuoso reports success of the un-registration through the requestComplete callback in IBackplaneObserver with a callback type of BackplaneCallbackType.UNREGISTER.
        When a device is unregistered; Virtuoso deletes all assets from the device and resets itself to a virgin state.
        Throws:
        BackplaneException - if not authenticated with the Backplane
        See Also:
        Observers.IBackplaneObserver
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • getLastAuthentication

        long getLastAuthentication()
        Timestamp of the last successful authentication with the Backplane.
        Returns:
        Timestamp of last successful authentication, in seconds since epoch, or -1 if never authenticated.
        Category:
        005_backplane

      • getAuthenticationStatus

        int getAuthenticationStatus()
        Current authentication status with the Backplane
        Returns:
        A value in AuthenticationStatus
        See Also:
        Common.AuthenticationStatus
        Category:
        005_backplane
